casebody.data:
BARCLAY PETROLEUM, INC.
v.
BAILEY. 2017-1387 Supreme Court of Ohio. February 28, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

Kennedy, Fischer, and DeWine, JJ., dissent.

APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

Cause accepted on proposition of law Nos. I and II.

O'Donnell, French, and DeGenaro, JJ., would accept the cause on all propositions of law.
